Description:
A LIGHT, FRESH & AIRY 2 BEDROOM UNIT
After a recent freshen up, this 2 bedroom unit only requires its new owner to either move in and enjoy or rent it out in its perfect condition. On a well maintained block of just 9 units the home is light and airy with polished hardwood floors, classic off white paint and big picture windows that bring plenty of light into the generous living area that adjoining the kitchen with gas oven/stove and an included meals area. Both bedrooms feature built in wardrobes with sliding mirrored doors while the bathroom, separate toilet and laundry have all also been updated. Extras include ducted heating and roller shutters on north facing windows and outside you find a single garage with room in front for another car plus a paved courtyard to keep maintenance to a minimum. Well positioned with buses out the front, the home is within minutes of Clarinda Shopping Centre as well as central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station.
Insights: 2/559 Clayton Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Build your dream home
Dual occupancy rear property, land with approved planning permits to build a double story town house. The already existing studio on the block currently sits with an informal lease in place pulling in a positive return. Located in the heart of Clayton shopping district, within walking distance to local cafes, restaurants, bars and aquatic centre. With Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and Clayton train station nearby.
Build your dream home with approved permits for a double story 16.5 square townhouse, 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom plus garage.

Description:
Comfortable and modern home with all the modern conveniences
As you enter this wonderfully appointed family home you're greeted with a formal entry that leads you into the generous sized rectangular lounge room that's perfect for entertaining. This property benefits from 3 great sized bedrooms all with robes that ensure comfort for the whole family.
The beautifully renovated Kitchen overlooks the meals area and has new appliances and gas cooking.
The property sits on 585 square metres of land (approx) and is perfect for a family that loves spending time outside.
There is also a shed & studio/workshop to the rear of the property that has electricity connected for your convenience.
In close proximity to Westall Train Station, bus stop and the new Springvale Homemaker Centre (IKEA), you don't have to look any further.
Call for an inspection today.
Other features are:
- 2 Toilets
- Ducted Heating
- Alarm System
- Split system Air-conditioning
- Polished Floorboards

Description:
The Perfect Beginning
An idyllic street front position and instantly comfortable with a charming facade, this sensational single-level town residence has been superbly renovated for current-day comfort delivering the perfect opportunity to first home buyers, downsizers and young families alike. Spacious, light-filled proportions boasts a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjacent meals area and large lounge spilling out via bi-fold doors to a private timber entertaining deck.
Three inviting bedrooms are complemented by two stylish bathrooms, ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioner and single lock-up carport, presenting an affordable entry to a highly sort after locale. With its stylish period design and rich appointments, this fully renovated town residence is situated within close proximity to all amenities including Clayton Train Station, public transport, recreational parklands, local shops and schools.

Description:
Move in and Relax
This modern and spacious townhouse enjoys an excellent location, just a short stroll to Westall Station, schools and local shops, and close to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Ikea and Monash Fwy. Comprising a sophisticated, open kitchen, overlooking the extensive open plan living and dining area, and with access to the 'no-maintenance' courtyard, with artificial lawn, perfect for relaxing on without the mowing! 3 robed bedrooms upstairs, plus a modern bathroom, ensuite and powder room downstairs, ducted heating, 4x split-systems and a remote double garage with access to the courtyard complete this impeccable residence. Inspect today.
Features
Modern design, open plan living and dining, ducted heating, 4x split-systems, dishwasher, water tank, remote double garage with access via laneway, and to courtyard.

Description:
Shine up this Pot of Gold
Rarely do you find a home as unique as this - open dining with spacious kitchen, very sizeable rear yard, near new hot water service, and a great mixture of polished boards and tiles throughout - this is a great purchase in a superb location. Head up the driveway , past the low maintenance front garden and onto your welcoming porch. From here you're lead down the path of timber floors and guided through to the 3 robed bedrooms, original bathroom and study nook at the end. The east end of this is lengthy home is a tiled and open plan dining featuring gas wall heater and lovely mantel all which flow through to the kitchen which boasts breakfast bench, dishwasher, wall oven and plenty of sunlight.
Head down one step to the rear of the home which is completed with a living room that features its own heater and access to the carport and garage. Completing the picture indoors is your bright laundry and separate toilet. Outdoors is where the uniqueness of this home is at the forefront with its 10 car garage with dual roller doors and spacious rear yard for the kids and pets to roam. Expertly located within moments of Westall train station and close by to a number of primary schools, Killester College and the local shops - this will have something for everyone. Currently leased, this unique home is one for the ages. Make sure you call today!
Photo ID Required
Chee-Ky Dunlop : 0422 910 881

Description:
Sold at Auction by Troy Le
Get your foot into this elusive and highly desired pocket of Clayton South with this great family home. Located in a quiet court off Westall Service road, close proximity all conveniences and major transport arterials. Minutes away from Springvale shopping central and Westall train station, bus stops right at hand and easy access to several local primary and secondary schools.
This family home has always been well maintained and offers spacious living:
* 3 generous size bedrooms with BIR
* Master with WIR and FES
* Large lounge adjoining kitchen and meals area
* Sitting room/study, which can convert to 4th bedroom
* 2 bathrooms, 2 toilets
* Ducted heating
* A/C
* Front porch and rear Verandah
With room for improvements, put your mark on this great family home!
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Photo I.D Required at all inspections.

How often can you find a property that you can call home and an investment property in the one go? Well, with this property you can live in the front home and receive income from the fully self-contained 5 Star Bungalow.
Situated in a handy and family friendly location, with nearby local schools, Springvale Shopping Centre and easy access to Monash Freeway. Make this an ideal family home and investment property.
The property is perfect if you are looking at having a home office or to house an extended family. Whatever you have in mind, it will cater for all.
Recently renovated and in good condition, you will find that it is ready to live in or rent out as it is.

-Full kitchen with dining area

This home will amaze you!!!!!!!!

With polished floorboards, spacious light filled living room, dining area, 2 robed bedrooms, kitchen and meals area, central bathroom, ducted heating, new window furnishings and freshly painted throughout. Also featuring large double garage and private courtyard. Offering privacy and security in a popular and convenient locale within walking distance to shops, medical centres and other facilities including Clayton Community Centre (incorporating public Library, gym and swimming pool) train station and schools.

Description:
Size, Potential & Location!
Seize the opportunity with this exceptionally deep (884sqm approx), versatile allotment. Representing an outstanding prospect for investors, renovators and developers, or brilliant as either a first home, lucrative investment or sensational site to demolish and rebuild multiple townhouses (STCA), this property is sure to grab your immediate attention! Impeccably maintained, the original brick home consists of 3 bedrooms, a lounge and separate dining room, central bathroom and gas cooking in the kitchen. Located within walking distance to schools, Westall train station and shops, with the Ikea Homemaker Centre also close, don't let this one pass you by!
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Sheer Living Pleasure or Perhaps a Savvy Investment
Offering an irresistible allure for owner occupiers with a busy lifestyle or astute investors seeking high-end rental returns, this townhouse has everything for today's modern lifestyle. With its own street frontage and short walking distance to shops, schools, buses and Westall station, the home's stylish interior boasts spacious open plan living/dining, beside the well appointed Caesar stone kitchen, opening to a sizable courtyard providing the perfect setting for unwinding or treating friends to a sumptuous barbeque. Three bedrooms are supported by ensuite off the master, family bathroom and downstairs powder room ... And with everything at your fingertips you can leave the car safely parked in the remote control double garage.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Description:
IDEAL FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT
This affordable home located within a short distance to both, Monash University & Monash Medical Centre is a great opportunity to move straight in and renovate, or the perfect opportunity to acquire a rental investment at an affordable price.
Situated opposite to the Keeley Reserve and within walking distance to Westall train station and Westall Secondary College, the location ticks all the boxes.
Comprises a bright and comfortable lounge, separate kitchen/meals area, 3 good size bedrooms, separate laundry, and generous front and rear yard areas.
Currently tenanted with a great rental return, ideal first home or an outstanding renovation opportunity
